verses.text_plain: And it came to pass at that time, that Judah went down from his brethren, and turned in to a certain Adullamite, whose name was Hirah.
verses.verse_html: 1And it came to pass at that time, that Judah went down from his brethren, and turned in to a certain Adullamite, whose name was Hirah.

tokens.text: And it came to pass at that time

verses.text_plain: And Judah saw there a daughter of a certain Canaanite, whose name was Shuah; and he took her, and went in unto her.
verses.verse_html: 2And Judah saw there a daughter of a certain Canaanite, whose name was Shuah; and he took her, and went in unto her.

verses.text_plain: And she conceived, and bare a son; and he called his name Er.
verses.verse_html: 3And she conceived, and bare a son; and he called his name Er.

verses.text_plain: And she conceived again, and bare a son; and she called his name Onan.
verses.verse_html: 4And she conceived again, and bare a son; and she called his name Onan.

verses.text_plain: And she yet again conceived, and bare a son; and called his name Shelah: and he was at Chezib, when she bare him.
verses.verse_html: 5And she yet again conceived, and bare a son; and called his name Shelah: and he was at Chezib, when she bare him.

verses.text_plain: And Judah took a wife for Er his firstborn, whose name was Tamar.
verses.verse_html: 6And Judah took a wife for Er his firstborn, whose name was Tamar.

verses.text_plain: And Er, Judah’s firstborn, was wicked in the sight of the Lord; and the Lord slew him.
verses.verse_html: 7And Er, Judah’s firstborn, was wicked in the sight of the Lord; and the Lord slew him.

verses.text_plain: And Judah said unto Onan, Go in unto thy brother’s wife, and marry her, and raise up seed to thy brother.
verses.verse_html: 8And Judah said unto Onan, Go in unto thy brother’s wife, and marry her, and raise up seed to thy brother.

verses.text_plain: And Onan knew that the seed should not be his; and it came to pass, when he went in unto his brother’s wife, that he spilled it on the ground, lest that he should give seed to his brother.
verses.verse_html: 9And Onan knew that the seed should not be his; and it came to pass, when he went in unto his brother’s wife, that he spilled it on the ground, lest that he should give seed to his brother.

tokens.text: should not be his; and it came to pass, when

verses.text_plain: And the thing which he did displeased the Lord: wherefore he slew him also.
verses.verse_html:
10And the thing which he did displeased the Lord: wherefore he slew him also. ▼
▼ displeased…: Heb. was evil in the eyes of the Lord

footnotes.body_text: ▼ displeased…: Heb. was evil in the eyes of the Lord
footnotes.body_html: ▼ displeased…: Heb. was evil in the eyes of the Lord

verses.text_plain: Then said Judah to Tamar his daughter in law, Remain a widow at thy father’s house, till Shelah my son be grown: for he said, Lest peradventure he die also, as his brethren did. And Tamar went and dwelt in her father’s house.
verses.verse_html: 11Then said Judah to Tamar his daughter in law, Remain a widow at thy father’s house, till Shelah my son be grown: for he said, Lest peradventure he die also, as his brethren did. And Tamar went and dwelt in her father’s house.

verses.text_plain: And in process of time the daughter of Shuah Judah’s wife died; and Judah was comforted, and went up unto his sheepshearers to Timnath, he and his friend Hirah the Adullamite.
verses.verse_html:
12And in process of time the daughter of Shuah Judah’s wife died; and Judah was comforted, and went up unto his sheepshearers to Timnath, he and his friend Hirah the Adullamite. ▼
▼ in process…: Heb. the days were multiplied

footnotes.body_text: ▼ in process…: Heb. the days were multiplied
footnotes.body_html: ▼ in process…: Heb. the days were multiplied

verses.text_plain: And it was told Tamar, saying, Behold thy father in law goeth up to Timnath to shear his sheep.
verses.verse_html: 13And it was told Tamar, saying, Behold thy father in law goeth up to Timnath to shear his sheep.

verses.text_plain: And she put her widow’s garments off from her, and covered her with a vail, and wrapped herself, and sat in an open place, which is by the way to Timnath; for she saw that Shelah was grown, and she was not given unto him to wife.
verses.verse_html:
14And she put her widow’s garments off from her, and covered her with a vail, and wrapped herself, and sat in an open place, which is by the way to Timnath; for she saw that Shelah was grown, and she was not given unto him to wife. ▼
▼ an open…: Heb. the door of eyes, or, of Enajim

footnotes.body_text: ▼ an open…: Heb. the door of eyes, or, of Enajim
footnotes.body_html: ▼ an open…: Heb. the door of eyes, or, of Enajim

verses.text_plain: When Judah saw her, he thought her to be an harlot; because she had covered her face.
verses.verse_html: 15When Judah saw her, he thought her to be an harlot; because she had covered her face.

verses.text_plain: And he turned unto her by the way, and said, Go to, I pray thee, let me come in unto thee; (for he knew not that she was his daughter in law.) And she said, What wilt thou give me, that thou mayest come in unto me?
verses.verse_html: 16And he turned unto her by the way, and said, Go to, I pray thee, let me come in unto thee; (for he knew not that she was his daughter in law.) And she said, What wilt thou give me, that thou mayest come in unto me?

tokens.text: I pray thee, let me come in
me, that thou mayest come in

verses.text_plain: And he said, I will send thee a kid from the flock. And she said, Wilt thou give me a pledge, till thou send it?
verses.verse_html:
17And he said, I will send thee a kid from the flock. And she said, Wilt thou give me a pledge, till thou send it? ▼
▼ a kid: Heb. a kid of the goats

footnotes.body_text: ▼ a kid: Heb. a kid of the goats
footnotes.body_html: ▼ a kid: Heb. a kid of the goats

verses.text_plain: And he said, What pledge shall I give thee? And she said, Thy signet, and thy bracelets, and thy staff that is in thine hand. And he gave it her, and came in unto her, and she conceived by him.
verses.verse_html: 18And he said, What pledge shall I give thee? And she said, Thy signet, and thy bracelets, and thy staff that is in thine hand. And he gave it her, and came in unto her, and she conceived by him.

verses.text_plain: And she arose, and went away, and laid by her vail from her, and put on the garments of her widowhood.
verses.verse_html: 19And she arose, and went away, and laid by her vail from her, and put on the garments of her widowhood.

verses.text_plain: And Judah sent the kid by the hand of his friend the Adullamite, to receive his pledge from the woman’s hand: but he found her not.
verses.verse_html: 20And Judah sent the kid by the hand of his friend the Adullamite, to receive his pledge from the woman’s hand: but he found her not.

verses.text_plain: Then he asked the men of that place, saying, Where is the harlot, that was openly by the way side? And they said, There was no harlot in this place.
verses.verse_html:
21Then he asked the men of that place, saying, Where is the harlot, that was openly by the way side? And they said, There was no harlot in this place. ▼
▼ openly: or, in Enajim

footnotes.body_html: ▼ openly: or, in Enajim

verses.text_plain: And he returned to Judah, and said, I cannot find her; and also the men of the place said, that there was no harlot in this place.
verses.verse_html: 22And he returned to Judah, and said, I cannot find her; and also the men of the place said, that there was no harlot in this place.

verses.text_plain: And Judah said, Let her take it to her, lest we be shamed: behold, I sent this kid, and thou hast not found her.
verses.verse_html:
23And Judah said, Let her take it to her, lest we be shamed: behold, I sent this kid, and thou hast not found her. ▼
▼ be shamed: Heb. become a contempt

tokens.text: to her, lest we be shamed

footnotes.body_text: ▼ be shamed: Heb. become a contempt
footnotes.body_html: ▼ be shamed: Heb. become a contempt

verses.text_plain: And it came to pass about three months after, that it was told Judah, saying, Tamar thy daughter in law hath played the harlot; and also, behold, she is with child by whoredom. And Judah said, Bring her forth, and let her be burnt.
verses.verse_html: 24And it came to pass about three months after, that it was told Judah, saying, Tamar thy daughter in law hath played the harlot; and also, behold, she is with child by whoredom. And Judah said, Bring her forth, and let her be burnt.

tokens.text: And it came to pass about three

verses.text_plain: When she was brought forth, she sent to her father in law, saying, By the man, whose these are, am I with child: and she said, Discern, I pray thee, whose are these, the signet, and bracelets, and staff.
verses.verse_html: 25When she was brought forth, she sent to her father in law, saying, By the man, whose these are, am I with child: and she said, Discern, I pray thee, whose are these, the signet, and bracelets, and staff.

verses.text_plain: And Judah acknowledged them, and said, She hath been more righteous than I; because that I gave her not to Shelah my son. And he knew her again no more.
verses.verse_html: 26And Judah acknowledged them, and said, She hath been more righteous than I; because that I gave her not to Shelah my son. And he knew her again no more.

tokens.text: than I; because that I gave

verses.text_plain: And it came to pass in the time of her travail, that, behold, twins were in her womb.
verses.verse_html: 27And it came to pass in the time of her travail, that, behold, twins were in her womb.

tokens.text: And it came to pass in the time

verses.text_plain: And it came to pass, when she travailed, that the one put out his hand: and the midwife took and bound upon his hand a scarlet thread, saying, This came out first.
verses.verse_html: 28And it came to pass, when she travailed, that the one put out his hand: and the midwife took and bound upon his hand a scarlet thread, saying, This came out first.

tokens.text: And it came to pass, when she travailed

verses.text_plain: And it came to pass, as he drew back his hand, that, behold, his brother came out: and she said, How hast thou broken forth? this breach be upon thee: therefore his name was called Pharez.
verses.verse_html:
29And it came to pass, as he drew back his hand, that, behold, his brother came out: and she said, How hast thou broken forth? this breach be upon thee: therefore his name was called Pharez. ▼
▼ How hast…: or, Wherefore hast thou made this breach against thee?
 , ▼
▼ Pharez: that is A breach

tokens.text: And it came to pass, as he drew back

footnotes.body_text: ▼ How hast…: or, Wherefore hast thou made this breach against thee?
footnotes.body_html: ▼ How hast…: or, Wherefore hast thou made this breach against thee?
▼ Pharez: that is A breach

verses.text_plain: And afterward came out his brother, that had the scarlet thread upon his hand: and his name was called Zarah.
verses.verse_html: 30And afterward came out his brother, that had the scarlet thread upon his hand: and his name was called Zarah.
